answers.answer: Hey i use to never be hungry either i would just lie around and sleep. at lunch i would  give my food away my mom finnaly took me to the doctor and i found out i had diabetes. Get some medical help! But i know that sometimes all food just look distusting and i dont whant to eat! good luck!

question: three days have passed and I havn't been feeling hungry at all. I'm usually the one binging on chocolates and stuff. I love my foods but maintain my weight at 55kg. I find this really strange. Its like I'm full all the time. All I've been having for the past few days is green tea, water and a sandwich I was forced to eat by my parents. I don't think I've got any eating disorders. I'm comfortable with my weight and shape. Anybody have any idea what this is???
title: i don't feel hungry!
